answers.answer: 2 years ago i went to the emerg wih abdominal pain and a lot of blood in my urine it ended up being an eptopic pregnancy for me and had to get my tube removed.......but blood in the urine could also be a kidney infection it could mean a few differnt things!! I hopr everything turns out for the best!! Good luck!

I had pretty bad abdominal pain about mid pregnancy and they found blood in my urine. I was told I had kidney stones... Yeah... Good stuff...! Anyway, they said I passed it and that it's more painful to pass a kidney stone than have a child, so according to that impeccable advice, labor should be a cake walk these next couple weeks! Lol
I doubt it would be gestational diabetes, especially not so early in pregnancy.
It's a uti, with some antibiotics she"ll be fine :)

question: Ok so my sister-in-law, is pregnant not surevof her due date yet she went to the Er for abdominal pain. they had her pee in a cup and they told her they found blood in her urine and that there was both red blood cells and white blood cells in her urine. I read up on it & still confused as to why or wat it could be. Has this happened to anyone!? And if not does anyone have any info they could give me? at first i was thinking gestational diebetes.. not sure tho
title: blood in urine
